title: Bug 4971 - Strange 'copy package'
description: When performing the 'copy package' action in org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui in jdt.ui3, an unexpected behavior occurs. Selecting xxx as the destination should result in the package 'ui' being copied, but this is not the case.
OB: After performing the 'copy package' action, the package 'ui' is not copied to the destination xxx.
EB: After performing the 'copy package' action, the package 'ui' should be successfully copied to the destination xxx.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui in jdt.ui3.
2. Select the 'copy package' action.
3. Choose xxx as the destination.
Expected result: The package 'ui' is successfully copied to the destination xxx.
Actual result: The package 'ui' is not copied to the destination xxx.
